value.fullName: Battelle is lead party. No IP transferred, but Sponsor can own technical information (TI) created under the agreement (DOE Approval NOT Required)
value.label: Battelle is lead party. No IP transferred, but Sponsor can own technical information (TI) created under the agreement (DOE Approval NOT Required)

value.fullName: Battelle is lead party. Sponsor gets royalty-free right to use TI subject to Battelle IP rights. (DOE Approval NOT Required)
value.label: Battelle is lead party. Sponsor gets royalty-free right to use TI subject to Battelle IP rights. (DOE Approval NOT Required)

value.fullName: Battelle is lead party. Battelle will report new inventions to Sponsor, under the terms of a separate option IP option Sponsor may license new IP from Battelle. (DOE Approval NOT Required)
value.label: Battelle is lead party. Battelle will report new inventions to Sponsor, under the terms of a separate option IP option Sponsor may license new IP from Battelle. (DOE Approval NOT Required)

value.fullName: Sponsor is lead party. Takes on all responsibilities under the class waiver. (DOE Approval NOT Required)
value.label: Sponsor is lead party. Takes on all responsibilities under the class waiver. (DOE Approval NOT Required)

value.fullName: Other- Please work with IPLS for phrasing-(DOE Approval may or may not be Required
value.label: Other- Please work with IPLS for phrasing (DOE Approval may or may not be Required)
